sentence.Network_en: Ren Jing considers herself a bit of a bookworm.

entry.def: If you describe someone as a bookworm, you mean they are very fond of reading.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who pays more attention to formal rules and book learning than they merit
2. someone who spends a great deal of time reading

auth_sentence.content: The movie director John Waters appeared a couple of years ago on the radio program "Bookworm," with Michael Silverblatt.
